item.title: Trump says Netflix, Warner Bros. deal 'could be a problem'; he'll be involved in approving
item.description: Trump's comments came days after Netflix beat out Paramount Skydance's offer for all of WBD, and Comcast's bid for part of the company.

item.title: Trump says Zelenskyy 'hasn't read U.S. peace proposal' as tensions mount
item.description: Tensions appear to be mounting once again between U.S. President Donald Trump and President Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

item.title: Treasury Secretary Bessent says he has divested his soybean farm
item.description: The New York Times has reported that Secretary Bessent owned as much as $25 million of soybean and corn farmland in North Dakota.

item.title: Trump slams pardoned Democratic congressman as 'disloyal' for not switching parties
Ukraine peace deal is really close, U.S. envoy Kellogg says
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump's outgoing Ukraine envoy said a deal to end the Ukraine war now depended on resolving two main outstanding issues.
